value.string: Read user data entered on the website
Read barcode , extract data and Verify UID
Fetch Experian and CIBIL Score through REST API

import sys
from twilio.rest import Client

def sendWhatsAppMessage():
	account_sid = 'ACb34e7ab2e6f1d9ba27e0f76ab7384efe'
	auth_token = '17426f91fe748e3a13b27ffadb13615e'
	client = Client(account_sid, auth_token)
	message = client.messages.create(
	from_='whatsapp:+14155238886',
	body='Your E-verification is completed, Please check you email for further details ',
	to='whatsapp:+917290931739')

value.expression:
Hi $userName$,

Congratulations
On Successful e-verification!

Thank you for applying through our automated loan application and we're excited to be part of your journey as a helping hand.

 

UID verified

  

 

Mobile Number Verified

  

 

PAN Number verified

  

You will shortly receive a call from our executive to discuss on the next steps and the details of loan disbursment.

Hi $userName$,

We are sorry to say but your e-verification was unsuccessful due to a mismatch between the form data and documents submitted.

Please don't hesitate to re-apply if you think that you missed any information or filled any of the information in-correctly.

You will shortly receive a call from our executive to discuss on the next steps and the details to guide with the next steps of loan application through physical document submision.
